attributes.action: More police patrol in local areas of Birmingham.
attributes.additional_details: Check Birmingham Mail Birmingham live BBC Midlands. Any news and I'm sure there won't be a week without someone stabbed, shot burgled or safe. Our safety needs to be priority now we need to take a stand.
attributes.background: Every day i hear someone either stabbed, shot, raped, or burgled. Now is the time of action something needs to be done. People are dying in broad daylight. I don't want to be one of them and I'm sure neither do you. There is police in the city centre but i don't see action taking place locally.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is the responsibility of your local council and your local police force. 

You could raise this issue with your Police and Crime Commissioner, who is elected, using the following website:

http://www.apccs.police.uk/find-your-pcc/
